SecureBoot.description: The SecureBoot schema contains UEFI Secure Boot information and represents properties for managing the UEFI Secure Boot functionality of a system.
SecureBoot.longDescription: This resource contains UEFI Secure Boot information for a Redfish implementation.

title: #SecureBoot.SecureBoot
